entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Woodstock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:33 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 7.5°C

entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers or drizzle. High 7.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or drizzle changing to a few flurries or drizzle overnight. Wind west 20 km/h. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or drizzle in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
